item.description:
Come learn a series of 9 power breaths first designed by Edwin Dingle in the late 1920's after traveling through Tibet and China and further refined by Master Choa Kok Sui, founder of Modern Pranic Healing and Arhatic Yoga. These 9 simple and straightforward exercises quickly and efficiently energize the mind and body by coordinating one's physical body, breath, and subtle energy channels. People of all ages can easily learn these exercises which do not require an existing base of physical ability or prowess. Furthermore, these exercises lead to mental calm and enhanced spiritual insight when practiced regularly and over time. A review of the body's subtle energy anatomy will also be part of the class.

Time: 7-9 pm, Thursday, March 13

Place: Farmington Valley Physical Therapy, 112 South Main Street, Unionville, CT 06085

Cost: $35, $60 for a couple, optional group energy healing afterwards for an additional $25

Facilitated by Gene Ang, Ph.D.


Reserve your place: call (203) 671-8047 or email gene.ang@gmail.com
http://www.geneang.co...
item.name: Tibetan Power Breaths
